This is what I was using before I tried to change the image value range, and before I was trying to subtract/add the mean pixel:

def ImageLoader(image_name, image_size):
    image = Image.open(image_name)
    image = image.convert('RGB')
    loader = transforms.Compose([transforms.Resize((image_size)), transforms.ToTensor()])  # resize and convert to tensor
    image = loader(image)
    return image

The GPU usage when using this simpler image loader seemed really low compared to what it is at now with my latest code.

def ImageLoader(image_name, image_size):

def ImageLoader(image_name, image_size):
